messages.content: What medicine should my friend take for sore throat?
For sore throat, your friend can try lozenges or mild pain relievers. ⚠ This is not medical advice. Please consult a doctor.
Can I drink milk with antibiotics?
Avoid milk with antibiotics like tetracycline as it may reduce absorption. Always consult your doctor.
Can I take painkillers on an empty stomach?
Some painkillers can irritate your stomach. It's best to take them with food unless advised otherwise by your doctor.
Is it ok to exercise while on medication?
It depends on the medication. Some may cause dizziness or fatigue. Always check with your doctor before exercising.
I have a cold, what medicine should I take?
For a common cold, over-the-counter medications like paracetamol or antihistamines can help. ⚠ This is not medical advice. Please consult a doctor.
What happens if I miss a dose?
If you miss a dose, take it as soon as you remember. If it's almost time for the next dose, skip the missed one. Do not double dose.
